newaza.title: Newaza (Ground Fighting)
newaza.description: Ground fighting techniques and principles of Goju Ryu

introduction.title: Newaza (Ground Fighting)
introduction.subtitle: Introduction
introduction.description: Goju-ryu has many traditional techniques where the opponent is taken down to the ground. As a follow-up, either decisive blows or joint locks are applied to stop the opponent in their aggressive behavior.

training-elements.title: Training Elements for Newaza
training-elements.subtitle: Preparatory exercises and basic training methods

kakie.title: Newaza Kakie
kakie.subtitle: Kakie exercises adapted for ground fighting

techniques.title: Ground Fighting Techniques
techniques.subtitle: Go and Ju techniques for ground fighting
